data.title: The Blue Kite - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The Blue Kite with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
1993

2 hr 18 mins

Drama

NR

Watchlist

Where to Watch

China's political and cultural revolution of the 1950s and '60s forms the basis for this moving treatise about a family caught in the upheaval. Lu Liping, Pu Quanxin. Li Guodong: Li Xuejian. Old Wu: Guo Baochang. Chen Shusheng: Zhong Ping. Chen Shuyan: Chu Quanzhong. Sister: Song Xiaoying. Zhu Ying: Zhang Hong. Directed by Tian Zhuangzhuang.
